title: How to turn off DEBUG messages that are rapidly filling up syslog
body:
System: 22.04.4 LTS
Installed via: snap
teams-for-linux version: 1.8.1

How do I  turn off the DEBUG messages that are rapidly filling up my syslog file? It's been 24 hours and my syslog is 19GB (yeah, that is **GIGA**-bytes!) and it's full of these:

```
Aug 15 12:52:19 myhostname teams-for-linux_teams-for-linux.desktop[86939]: [DEBUG] GetSystemIdleState => IdleTimeout: 300s, IdleTimeoutPollInterval: 10s, ActiveCheckPollInterval: 2s, IdleTime: 2s, IdleState: 'active'
Aug 15 12:52:30 myhostname teams-for-linux_teams-for-linux.desktop[86939]: [DEBUG] GetSystemIdleState => IdleTimeout: 300s, IdleTimeoutPollInterval: 10s, ActiveCheckPollInterval: 2s, IdleTime: 0s, IdleState: 'active'
Aug 15 12:52:41 myhostname teams-for-linux_teams-for-linux.desktop[86939]: [DEBUG] GetSystemIdleState => IdleTimeout: 300s, IdleTimeoutPollInterval: 10s, ActiveCheckPollInterval: 2s, IdleTime: 6s, IdleState: 'active'
Aug 15 12:52:52 myhostname teams-for-linux_teams-for-linux.desktop[86939]: [DEBUG] GetSystemIdleState => IdleTimeout: 300s, IdleTimeoutPollInterval: 10s, ActiveCheckPollInterval: 2s, IdleTime: 0s, IdleState: 'active'
Aug 15 12:53:03 myhostname teams-for-linux_teams-for-linux.desktop[86939]: [DEBUG] GetSystemIdleState => IdleTimeout: 300s, IdleTimeoutPollInterval: 10s, ActiveCheckPollInterval: 2s, IdleTime: 2s, IdleState: 'active'
Aug 15 12:53:14 myhostname teams-for-linux_teams-for-linux.desktop[86939]: [DEBUG] GetSystemIdleState => IdleTimeout: 300s, IdleTimeoutPollInterval: 10s, ActiveCheckPollInterval: 2s, IdleTime: 4s, IdleState: 'active'
Aug 15 12:53:25 myhostname teams-for-linux_teams-for-linux.desktop[86939]: [DEBUG] GetSystemIdleState => IdleTimeout: 300s, IdleTimeoutPollInterval: 10s, ActiveCheckPollInterval: 2s, IdleTime: 0s, IdleState: 'active'
Aug 15 12:54:52 myhostname teams-for-linux_teams-for-linux.desktop[86939]: message repeated 8 times: [ [DEBUG] GetSystemIdleState => IdleTimeout: 300s, IdleTimeoutPollInterval: 10s, ActiveCheckPollInterval: 2s, IdleTime: 0s, IdleState: 'active']
```
